attr.title: MiniZelda
attr.desc: A ZELDA fan game that was made using the Pyxel engine.
attr.inst: Download at itch.io https://aged99oow.itch.io/zelda and place MiniZelda.pyxapp into minizelda directory
attr.inst_md: Download at [itch.io](https://aged99oow.itch.io/zelda) and place MiniZelda.pyxapp into minizelda directory
